div.p: This term is located in WRITING RECEPTION RDESTRUCTIONOFWORK . It allows you to indicate whether the writer herself destroyed her work. It has two allowable values: self and other. Their meanings are fairly self-explanatory.

div.codeblock: <RDESTRUCTIONOFWORK DESTROYEDBY="self">When she realized that her book was actually in print, Millie Connought spent a frenzied evening throwing complimentary copies into the fire-pit in her backyard.</RDESTRUCTIONOFWORK>

div.p: Question: My author threw away a manuscript of an unpublished work. Do I tag it here?
